scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name tamweel-calc-prod
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name tamweel-calc-prod --branch main
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name tamweel-calc-prod --branch genspark_ai_developer
scripts.git:push: git add . && git commit -m 'تحديث' && git push origin main
scripts.git:push:dev: git add . && git commit -m 'تحديث تطويري' && git push origin genspark_ai_developer
scripts.update:full: npm run git:push && npm run deploy:prod
scripts.db:reset: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed
scripts.help: echo 'استخدم: npm run deploy:prod للنشر | npm run dev:sandbox للتطوير | npm run db:migrate:prod للـ migrations'
